name: River Fire
description:
You throw molotovs across the river and Observe the Fire from the Opposite Shore.

You can prepare by breaking bridges. But don't be too greedy or you might just end up in the fire yourself and that's a GAME OVER! Can you find the secret win state?

Use the mechanics to their full potential to maximize points! You will be scored by the number of ground tiles you've burned. (% of island engulfed)

River Fire is a game I made for a friendly jam I did with some friends. We call it the Friends Jam and this was our second one. Friends Jam II's theme was Observe the Fire from the Opposite Shore
